img_text: Game stalker... King Brit's 500 hunting murders By ED MCCONNELL A BRIT trophy hunter has racked up more than 500 animal kills around the world. Malcolm King, 74, has been collecting awards for gunning down rare lions, elephants, rhinos and others since 2000. A hunting club's online diary said King's trophy collection spans as many as 340 species He is photographed next to the dead bodies of large Himalayan and French mammals. It also details how a number of rainforest kills would earn the invest- ment company owner a prestigious award.
